Translations.Text: (Nie imponovat ich peniaze ich dieta! GOD ZAPRICINIT these JE ZDROJ retribution them v this ZIVOT when they UMREL) ICH souls depart chvila they bol disbelievers
They swear GOD they belong ona chvila they robi nie belong ona; they bol divisive ludia
If they zalozit refuge caves zatajit miesto they ist it rushing
Some z them criticize tvoj distribution laska; k; bliznemu; if they dat therefrom they become satisfied they nie dat therefrom they become objectors
They satisfied co GOD Jeho posol dat them. They said GOD suffices us. GOD will zadovazit for us JEHO bounties A so will JEHO POSOL. My seeking len GOD

Laska K Bliznemu ist chudobny chudobny robotnik zbierat them new converts volny slaves do those burdened by sudden expenses zapricinit GOD cestovat alien Such bol GOD's commandment. GOD bol Omniscient Wise

Some z them zranit prophet saying He bol all ears Say bol lepsie ona ze he listens do ona! He verit v GOD trusts believers. He bol zlutovanie those ona verit. Those zranit GOD's posol incurred painful retribution
